LOGIN.signin.title: Sign In With Your Work Account
LOGIN.left.side.text: This is the WWU LGSE application used to manage incidents requiring isolation and restoration activities on the WWU gas network. The application is for authorised users only. All activity is logged and regularly checked. By using this application, you are confirming that you are authorised to undertake the activities that are assigned to you and use of this system constitutes consent to these terms.

REGISTER.register.title: Sign Up With Your Work Account
REGISTER.left.side.text: We are your gas emergency and pipeline service. A warm welcome to Wales & West Utilities Local Gas Supply Emergency(LGSE) Portal.We work to keep our 7.5m customers safe &warm with a gas supply that can be relied upon and a level of service to trust.
REGISTER.valid.email.text: Please enter a valid work email!
REGISTER.valid.first.name: Please enter a valid First Name(max 20 char)!
REGISTER.valid.lastname: Please enter a valid Last Name(max 20 char)!
REGISTER.valid.employee.id: Please enter a valid Employee Id!
REGISTER.valid.euser: Please enter a valid EUSR (max 9 digits)
REGISTER.valid.contact.number: Please enter a valid Contact number!(max 10)
REGISTER.success.message: Sign Up is Successfull, OTP has been sent to your email to activate your account

TERMS-AND-CONDITIONS.heading: Accept Terms and Conditions
TERMS-AND-CONDITIONS.tandc1: This transmission and any attachments to it are strictly confidential and are intended solely for the person or organisation to whom it is addressed. Its contents may contain legal professional or other privileged information. If you are not the intended recipient, please notify us immediately and delete it, without retaining it, copying it, disclosing its contents to anyone or acting upon it. You must ensure that you have appropriate virus protection before you open or detach any documents from this transmission. We accept no responsibility for viruses. We may monitor replies to emails for operational or lawful business reasons. The views or opinions expressed in this email are the author's own and may not, unless expressly stated to the contrary, reflect the views or opinions of Wales & West Utilities Limited, its affiliates or subsidiaries. Unless expressly stated to the contrary, neither Wales & West Utilities Limited, its affiliates or subsidiaries, their respective directors, officers or employees make any representation about, or accept any liability for, the accuracy or completeness of such views or opinions. Wales & West Utilities Limited Registered office: Wales & West House, Spooner Close, Celtic Springs, Coedkernew, NEWPORT NP10 8FZ Registered in England and Wales No 5046791

FORGOT-PASSWORD.title.text: Please enter your Work Email Address
FORGOT-PASSWORD.left.side.text: We are your gas emergency and pipeline service. A warm welcome to Wales & West Utilities Local Gas Supply Emergency(LGSE) Portal.We work to keep our 7.5m customers safe &warm with a gas supply that can be relied upon and a level of service to trust.

RESET-PASSWORD.left.side.text: We are your gas emergency and pipeline service. A warm welcome to Wales & West Utilities Local Gas Supply Emergency(LGSE) Portal.We work to keep our 7.5m customers safe &warm with a gas supply that can be relied upon and a level of service to trust.
RESET-PASSWORD.valid.workemail: Please enter a valid work email!
RESET-PASSWORD.password.validation.2: Minimum 8 characters, at least 1 uppercase and 1 special character

NEW-PASSWORD.title.text: Please enter new password to reset
NEW-PASSWORD.left.side.text: We are your gas emergency and pipeline service. A warm welcome to Wales & West Utilities Local Gas Supply Emergency(LGSE) Portal.We work to keep our 7.5m customers safe &warm with a gas supply that can be relied upon and a level of service to trust.
NEW-PASSWORD.valid.workemail: Please enter a valid work email!
NEW-PASSWORD.password.validation.2: Minimum 8 characters, at least 1 uppercase and 1 special character
NEW-PASSWORD.password.not.match: New and Confirm password must be same!

ACTIVATE.left.side.text: We are your gas emergency and pipeline service. A warm welcome to Wales & West Utilities Local Gas Supply Emergency(LGSE) Portal.We work to keep our 7.5m customers safe &warm with a gas supply that can be relied upon and a level of service to trust.
ACTIVATE.password.validation.2: Minimum 8 characters, at least 1 uppercase and 1 special character

RESPONSE-CODES.USER_MPRN_MAPPING_EXISTS: User is already assigned to this MPRN
RESPONSE-CODES.HTTP_ERROR_403: You dont have to access this resource
RESPONSE-CODES.USER_REGISTERED: Registered Successfully! Activation link sent to your email, Please activate and Login.
RESPONSE-CODES.USER_ALREADY_ACTIVATED: You have already activated, Please Login!
RESPONSE-CODES.USER_NOT_ACVTD: You have not activated your account, Activation link sent to your email, Please activate and Login.
RESPONSE-CODES.INVALID_USER_PWD: You email id and Password, does not match
RESPONSE-CODES.UNAUTHORIZED_ACCESS: You are not authorized to access
RESPONSE-CODES.UNAUTHORIZED_REQUEST: You do not have access to this resource
RESPONSE-CODES.OTP_GENERATED: OTP genetated successfully, please check your email
RESPONSE-CODES.OTP_GENERATED_ALREADY: OTP is already generated, please check your email
RESPONSE-CODES.USER_EXISTS: You are already registered, Please Login!
RESPONSE-CODES.Unauthorized: Email ID and Password did not match
RESPONSE-CODES.USER_ROLE_MAP_DOES_NOT_EXISTS: User role map does not exists
RESPONSE-CODES.USER_PREFERED_ROLE_NOTSET: User prefered role is not set
RESPONSE-CODES.USER_DOES_NOT_PERM_ON_OPERATION: User does not have permission on this operation
RESPONSE-CODES.USER_EXISTS_NOT_ACTIVATED: User already exists,  please contact support to activate account
RESPONSE-CODES.OLD_PWD_NOTMATCHED: You have entered the wrong old password.

WELCOMETXT.defaulttext.text: Only authorised users can access this portal. All activity is logged and regularly checked. Using this portal consents to these terms.
